Package org.efaps.util.cache

This package contains the cache as it used inside eFaps to store all Objects.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CacheObjectInterface
    Common interface of cached object.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractAutomaticCache<T extends CacheObjectInterface>
    Cache that is initialized automatically on the first access to it.
    AbstractCache<T extends CacheObjectInterface>
    The class is used to cache three not independent information which are completely defined once but needed many times within eFaps.
    CacheLogListener
    TODO comment!
    InfinispanCache
    TODO comment!
    NoOpCache<K,V>
    A Cache that looks like a normal Cache but is not Operational at all.
    NoOpCache.DummyIterator<E>  
    NoOpCache.DummySet<E>  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CacheReloadException
    The CacheReloadException class is an exception is thrown, if a cache implementing AbstractCache could not be reloaded.

Package org.efaps.util.cache Description

This package contains the cache as it used inside eFaps to store all Objects.
